item.title: Winter Burrow launches November 12
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Cozy woodland survival game dated.

Cozy woodland survival game Winter Burrow will launch for Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on November 12, publisher Noodlecake and developer Pine Creek Games announced. It will also be available via Game Pass.

Here is an overview of the game, via Noodlecake:

Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game. Explore, gather resources, craft tools, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals!

In Winter Burrow, you play a mouse who returns from the big city to find their childhood home in ruins. To make matters worse, your Aunt (who was supposed to be looking after it) has gone missing. Restore your broken-down childhood burrow to its former glory so you can relax in front of the fireplace.

Brave the elements and journey out into the frozen wilderness to collect vital resources for both yourself and your new home. Beware of the insect wildlife and remember that nobody survives on their own; find new friends, expand your survival handbook and solve the mystery of what happened to your Aunt.

Winter Burrow is a survival game you play at your own pace. Customize your character, decorate your burrow and choose a path that fits your play style. This story is yours to tell.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/winter-burrow-launches-november-12

item.title: Starsand Island for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC launches February 1, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Life simulation game dated.

Life simulation game Starsand Island will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on February 1, 2026, developer Seed Lab announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Seed Lab:

Live aboard a customizable houseboat—not just farming! Break free from land limits, decorate your unique floating home, and enjoy a soothing life sparkling on the waves. Adorable outfits are here! Dress up your character and animal companions anytime—become the coolest islander around. Discover secret aquarium worlds! Build your dream fish tank, collect colorful marine life, and create an enchanting underwater universe.

A brand-new family-friendly mini-game is now available—team up with neighbors and friends for double the fun! Upgraded farm automation lets you sit back and relax, giving you more time to explore and socialize.

The dev team says: “This game is a fairy-tale utopia made for young at heart.” From Eastern aesthetics to deep do-it-yourself freedom, we hope everyone finds their own warmth and happiness here.

Let’s set sail together soon—get ready to begin your very own pastoral fairy-tale adventure, made for young at heart!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/starsand-island-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc-launches-february-1-2026

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories, Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin coming to Xbox One on November 14
item.content:encoded:
• Xbox One

Currently available for PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC.

Capcom will release turn-based RPG Monster Hunter Stories and sequel Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin for Xbox One on November 14, the company announced.

Both titles are currently already available for PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.

A new entry, Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on March 13, 2026.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/monster-hunter-stories-monster-hunter-stories-2-wings-of-ruin-coming-to-xbox-one-on-november-14

item.title: 007 First Light – Gemma Chan announce trailer
item.content:encoded:
IO Interactive has released a new trailer for 007 First Light introducing Dr. Selina Tan, portrayed by Gemma Chan.

Her description reads: “Dr. Selina Tan, played by Gemma Chan, is a brilliant and passionate academic with a background in psychology and game theory whose role at MI6 is critical in Bond’s journey to earning the 00 status in 007 First Light.”

007 First Light is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on March 27, 2026.

Watch the reveal trailer below.

Gemma Chan Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/007-first-light-gemma-chan-announce-trailer

item.title: Gungrave G.O.R.E Blood Heat announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A fully rebuilt version of Gungrave G.O.R.E.

Studio IGGYMOB has announced Gungrave G.O.R.E Blood Heat, a fully rebuilt version of Gungrave G.O.R.E coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam, Microsoft Store). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Studio IGGYMOB:

Wake up! Gunslingers! Gungrave G.O.R.E Blood Heat is the fully rebuilt version of Gungrave G.O.R.E, featuring a modernized system with a new engine and enhanced visual quality.

New systems, more refined Characters and Background visuals, the return of heritage, exclusive characters, and more—get ready for the completely transformed Gungrave G.O.R.E Blood Heat!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/gungrave-gore-blood-heat-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc
